Text.Name: LingZhi_Huo
Text.ThingName: Fire Spirit Root: Crimson Fruit Tree
Text.Desc: The plant of Crimson Fruit, an Elemental Medicine. Grows in a place with dense Qi, compatible element and fertile soil. For its special trait, it has to grow in an environment above [temperature]200[/temperature].

Text.Name: LingZhi_Jin
Text.Desc: The plant of Sage Fruit, an Elemental Medicine. Grows in a place with dense Qi, compatible element and fertile soil. Extremely sensitive to high temperature, but relatively resistant to cold. It has to grow in an environment below [temperature]20[/temperature].

Text.Name: LingZhi_Mu
Text.Desc: The plant of Gnarled Vine, an Elemental Medicine. Grows in a place with dense Qi, compatible element and fertile soil. It has a strict requirement for environment temperature, and only grows in between [temperature]15[/temperature]-[/temperature]35[/temperature].

Text.Name: LingZhi_Shui
Text.Desc: The Prism Lotus plant, an Elemental Medicine. Grows in places with dense Qi, compatible element and fertile soil. It prefers low temperature, and only grows in an environment below [temperature]-120[/temperature].

Text.Name: LingZhi_Tu
Text.Desc: The plant of Ocher Essence, an elemental medicine. Grows in a place with dense Qi, compatible element and fertile soil. It avoids low temperature, and only grows in an environment above [temperature]30[/temperature].
